content: What an eloquent appeal for such an under-appreciated topic! Your words struck me as a Recreation Therapist whose work entails regularly attempting to reconnect people (or perhaps introduce them) to the leisure they enjoy to improve their overall well-being. Because the evidence for the health benefits of all you described here is getting harder to ignore. We need fursat- recreation, sports, hobbies and simply being still. I get excited whenever I see anyone acknowledge it, but this time I was also able to learn something, so thank you!
